## Source: ossf-package-analysis (ca3c517cac33d5fa40994b1304bd775f28b7cc7abbe7781a8f98db43839a47ab)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'sendbird-uikit-testing-tools' @ 1019.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
